channel.title: Books on Torbjörn Hedberg · Designer
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Torbjörn Hedberg · Designer

item.title: A Cut up World
item.description: About An exploration of our time and the borderland between two worlds. How they differ; but also how they draw near to one another. An investigation of how the internet and the tools we use daily can be used to create a story. Role Graphic designer

item.title: Things in a Conversation
item.description: About Conversing is probably not an activity that would be expected between any objects, hence it breaks with certain preconceived expectations. Both in how the objects could be understood, but also in how the perception of the conversation is to be interpreted in this situation. What are they, and what are they talking about? Role Design and manufacturing of artifacts with CNC and wood work craft tools. Design and production of sprial book.
